app.title: InventoryHero
app.loading_content: Almost ready! 🚀 We‚Äôre fine-tuning everything for you. 🛠️

description: An easy to use inventory management system
not_found: We couldn‚Äôt find what you were looking for, but this cat‚Äôs ready for an adventure!
logging_out: We are logging you out, please wait a few seconds

password_reset.description: Please enter your email address, and we will send you instructions on how to reset your password.

error.invalid_token: Your password reset request appears to be invalid. Please double-check that you've copied everything correctly from the email.
error.expired: Your password reset link has expired. Please request a new link to reset your password.

product.title: New product
product.start_typing: Start typing to create a new product üòä

hints.combobox: Either enter a new product name (must be unique) or select an existing product
hints.locationSelect: If you want to store your product at a location or in a box, select the container here
hints.amount: How many instances of this product do you want to store?

hints.boxName: Name of the box you want to create
hints.locationSelect: If your box should be stored at a location, select it here

hints.locationName: Name of the location you want to add

delete_detail.title: 🗑️ Confirm Deletion at {storage}
delete_detail.text: You are about to delete all instances of this product at the specified storage. This action cannot be undone. Are you sure you want to proceed?

delete_product.title: 🗑️ Confirm Product Deletion
delete_product.text: You are about to delete this product from every storage. This action will remove the product entirely and cannot be undone. Are you sure you want to proceed?

product.all_displayed: Every storage location of this product has been displayed.

products.all_displayed: You've reached the end. No more products to see here.
products.no_matches: No products match the current filter.

confirm_delete.title: Delete box
confirm_delete.text: This will delete this box. Content will be moved to the default storage ('void'). This is destructive and cannot be undone. Do you want to proceed?

box.all_displayed: No more items left in box to display

boxes.all_displayed: You've reached the end. No more boxes to see here.
boxes.no_matches: No boxes match the current filter.

confirm_delete.title: Delete location
confirm_delete.text: This will delete this location. Content will be moved to the default storage ('void'). This is destructive and cannot be undone. Do you want to proceed?

location.all_displayed: No more items left at location to display

locations.all_displayed: You've reached the end. No more locations to see here.
locations.no_matches: No locations match the current filter.

confirm.title: Leave Household {name}
confirm.text: Leaving this household can not be undone. To rejoin the household you'll need to ask the owner for a new invite.

not_found.title: Household Not Found 😔
not_found.text: We couldn't locate the household you‚Äôre looking for. It might have been removed or not available at the moment. Try refreshing the page to see if that helps.

no_rights.title: Permission Required 🔒
no_rights.text: You don‚Äôt have permission to edit this household. Only the creator or owner of the household can make changes. Please suggest your changes to the owner of this household

confirm.text: Are you sure you want to delete this household? This action is permanent and cannot be undone. All data related to the household will be permanently removed, and members will no longer have access to it. Please confirm if you wish to proceed.
confirm.title: ‚ö†️ Confirm Household Deletion 🗑️

confirm.text: Are you sure you want to transfer ownership of this household? This action is permanent and cannot be undone. Ownership and all permissions, including the ability to edit, delete, and invite users to the household, will be transferred to the chosen user: {user}. Please confirm if you wish to proceed.
confirm.title: ‚ö†️ Confirm Ownership Transfer 🏠

confirm.text: Are you sure you want to remove this user from the household? This action will be executed immediately and cannot be undone. The user will be removed from the household, and if they wish to rejoin, a new invite will need to be issued. Please confirm if you wish to proceed.
confirm.title: 🚪 Confirm User Removal 🚫

confirm.text: Are you sure you want to delete this invite? This action will invalidate the invite link, and any user attempting to join with this link will not be able to. If you want to invite the user again, a new invite will need to be issued. Please confirm if you wish to proceed.
confirm.title: ‚ùå Confirm Invite Deletion 🚫

rules.name_required: A name needs to be set!
rules.name_shorter_than: The name must be shorter than 26 characters

rules.valid_email: Please enter a valid email address.
rules.username_fmt_rule: Username must be 3-25 characters long and can only include letters, numbers, dots, hyphens, and underscores.
rules.min_password_length: The password needs to have at least 8 characters

rules.username_needed: An username needs to be supplied
rules.password_needed: A password needs to be supplied

print.example_text: This is an example label text

qr_code_settings.title: QR Code Settings

leave.text: You are about to leave this page. Any unsaved inputs will be lost!
leave.title: Leave...?

confirmation.verifying: Verifying your email now, this may take a moment...
confirmation.invalid_code: This email address was already verified, try logging in please

join.title: {owner} wants you to join their household!
join.text: If you want to join the their household {name} and start inventorying with {owner} accept below.

invite.title: Invite your friend
invite.text:
Hey! 🎉

Let‚Äôs get organized together! 📦 

I‚Äôve been using InventoryHero to manage my stuff, and I think you‚Äôll love it too! Check it out and join me here: 

{inviteLink}
invite.copy_to_clipboard: Copy the invite link into your clipboard...

users.delete_confirm_body_single: Are you sure you want to delete the user {name}?

password_reset.title: Reset password of {username}

password_reset.email_or_direct: Either reset the user's password by clicking the " @:administration.users.password_reset.send_email " button or do it manually. If you are doing manually you need to notify your user to reset their password afterwards!
